allow: Bash(do sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to load data'''')/logger.error(''''Failed to load transaction data'''', err)/g" "$file" sed -i '' 's/console\.error(""""Failed to fetch profile:"""", err)/logger.error(""""Failed to fetch profile"""", err)/g' "$file" sed -i '' 's/console\.error(""""Failed to update profile:"""", err)/logger.error(""""Failed to update profile"""", err)/g' "$file" sed -i '' 's/console\.error(""""Failed to change password:"""", err)/logger.error(""""Failed to change password"""", err)/g' "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(err)/logger.error(''''Error occurred'''', err)/g" "$file" sed -i '' 's/console\.error(""""Failed to fetch dashboard data:"""", error)/logger.error(""""Failed to fetch dashboard data"""", error)/g' "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to delete transaction:'''', err)/logger.error(''''Failed to delete transaction'''', err)/g" "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to fetch categories:'''', err)/logger.error(''''Failed to fetch categories'''', err)/g" "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to delete category:'''', err)/logger.error(''''Failed to delete category'''', err)/g" "$file" sed -i '' 's/console\.error(""""Registration failed"""", err)/logger.error(""""Registration failed"""", err)/g' "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to initialize balance:'''', error)/logger.error(''''Failed to initialize balance'''', error)/g" "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to initialize BalanceManager:'''', error)/logger.error(''''Failed to initialize BalanceManager'''', error)/g" "$file" sed -i '' "s/console\.error(''''Failed to refresh BalanceManager:'''', error)/logger.error(''''Failed to refresh BalanceManager'''', error)/g" "$file" done)
